title: Endings Guide
content:
alogue options below

ENDING DESCRIPTION

Similar to the previous ending, the only difference here is choosing another option from the ones shown during your conversation with Mystra.

I came to surrender them. The Crown, the Karsite Weave- take it all. I will become a new kind of god. One with ambition. I'm here for your godhood, Mystra. I'm going to rule the weave.

If you choose to surrender everything, Mystra will commend you for your service and you will get the next choices:

I only wanted
